item.text: Now we make known to you, brothers and sisters, the grace of God given to the churches of Macedonia,

<st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">during</st> a <st data-num="4183" class="">severe</st> <st data-num="1382" class="">ordeal</st> of <st data-num="2347" class="">suffering</st>, <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="4050" class="">abundant</st> <st data-num="5479" class="">joy</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="899" class="">extreme</st> <st data-num="4432" class="">poverty</st> have <st data-num="4052" class="">overflowed</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="4149" class="">wealth</st><n id="1" /> of <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="572" class="">generosity</st>.

<st data-num="3754" class="">For</st> I <st data-num="3140" class="">testify</st>, they gave <st data-num="2596">according to</st> their <st data-num="1411" class="">means</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3844" class="">beyond</st> their <st data-num="1411" class="">means</st>. They did so <st data-num="830" class="">voluntarily</st>,<n id="1" />

<st data-num="1189" class="">begging</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="4183" class="">great</st> <st data-num="3874" class="">earnestness</st> for the <st data-num="5485" class="">blessing</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2842" class="">fellowship</st> of <st data-num="1248" class="">helping</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="40" class="">saints</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> they did this <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2531">just as</st> we had <st data-num="1679" class="">hoped</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> they <st data-num="1325" class="">gave</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">themselves</st> <st data-num="4413">first</st> to the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> to <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">by</st> the <st data-num="2307" class="">will</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>.

<st data-num="1519" class="">Thus</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1473" class="">we</st> <st data-num="3870" class="">urged</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="5103" class="">Titus</st> <st data-num="2443" class="">that</st>, <st data-num="2531">just as</st> he had <st data-num="4278">previously begun</st> this work,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="3779" class="">so</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> he should <st data-num="2005" class="">complete</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="5485">act of kindness</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">for</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>.

<st data-num="235" class="">But</st> <st data-num="5618" class="">as</st> you <st data-num="4052" class="">excel</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">everything</st>—in <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st>, in <st data-num="3056" class="">speech</st>, in <st data-num="1108" class="">knowledge</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> in <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="4710" class="">eagerness</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> in the <st data-num="26" class="">love</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> that is <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st><n id="2" />—<st data-num="2443">make sure that</st> you <st data-num="4052" class="">excel</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="5485">act of kindness</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="2532">too</st>.

I am <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st> this <st data-num="2596">as</st> a <st data-num="2003" class="">command</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> I am <st data-num="1381" class="">testing</st> the <st data-num="1103" class="">genuineness</st> of <st data-num="5212" class="">your</st> <st data-num="26" class="">love</st> by comparison <st data-num="1223" class="">with</st> the <st data-num="4710" class="">eagerness</st> of <st data-num="2087" class="">others</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> you <st data-num="1097" class="">know</st> the <st data-num="5485" class="">grace</st><n id="1" /> of <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>, <st data-num="3754">that</st> although he <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> <st data-num="4145">rich</st>, he became <st data-num="4433">poor</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">for</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="1223">sakes</st>, <st data-num="2443">so that</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> by <st data-num="1565" class="">his</st> <st data-num="4432" class="">poverty</st> could become <st data-num="4147" class="">rich</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">So</st> here <st data-num="1325" class="">is</st> my <st data-num="1106" class="">opinion</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">on</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this matter</st>: <st data-num="3778" class="">It</st> is to <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="4851" class="">advantage</st>, since you<n id="1" /> <st data-num="4278">made a good start</st> <st data-num="4070" class="">last year</st> <st data-num="3756 3441">both</st> in your <st data-num="4160">giving</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> your <st data-num="2309" class="">desire</st> to give,

to <st data-num="2005" class="">finish</st> what you <st data-num="4160" class="">started</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3704" class="">so that</st> <st data-num="2509" class="">just as</st> you <st data-num="2309" class="">wanted</st> to do it <st data-num="4288" class="">eagerly</st>,<n id="2" /> you can <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> <st data-num="2005" class="">complete</st> it <st data-num="1537" class="">according to</st> your <st data-num="2192" class="">means</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> the <st data-num="4288" class="">eagerness</st> is <st data-num="4295" class="">present</st>, the gift itself<n id="1" /> is <st data-num="2144" class="">acceptable</st> <st data-num="2526" class="">according to</st> <st data-num="1437" class="">whatever</st> one <st data-num="2192" class="">has</st>, <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2526">according to</st> what he <st data-num="2192" class="">does</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> I do <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> say this <st data-num="2443" class="">so</st> there would be <st data-num="425" class="">relief</st> for <st data-num="243" class="">others</st> and <st data-num="2347" class="">suffering</st> for <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> as a <st data-num="1537">matter of</st> <st data-num="2471" class="">equality</st>.

<st data-num="1722">At</st> the <st data-num="3568" class="">present</st> <st data-num="2540">time</st>, <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="4051" class="">abundance</st> will meet their <st data-num="5303" class="">need</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2443" class="">so that</st> one day their <st data-num="4051" class="">abundance</st> may <st data-num="2532">also</st> <st data-num="1096" class="">meet</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="5303" class="">need</st>, and <st data-num="3704" class="">thus</st> there may <st data-num="1096" class="">be</st> <st data-num="2471" class="">equality</st>,
as it is written: “The one who gathered much did not have too much, and the one who gathered little did not have too little.”
But thanks be to God who put in the heart of Titus the same devotion I have for you,

<st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> he not <st data-num="3303" class="">only</st> <st data-num="1209" class="">accepted</st> our request, <st data-num="1161">but</st> since he <st data-num="5225" class="">was</st> <st data-num="4705">very eager</st>,<n id="1" /> he is <st data-num="1831" class="">coming</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> of <st data-num="830">his own accord</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">And</st> we are <st data-num="4842" class="">sending</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3326">along with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> the <st data-num="80" class="">brother</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">who</st> is <st data-num="1868" class="">praised</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">by</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="1577" class="">churches</st> for his work <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> spreading the <st data-num="2098" class="">gospel</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="3756 3441">In addition</st>,<n id="1" /> this brother<n id="2" /> has <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> been <st data-num="5500" class="">chosen</st> <st data-num="5259" class="">by</st> the <st data-num="1577" class="">churches</st> as <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="4898" class="">traveling companion</st> as we <st data-num="1247" class="">administer</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="5485">generous gift</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="1391" class="">glory</st> of the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="846">himself</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> to show <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="4288">readiness to help</st>.<n id="4" />

We <st data-num="4724" class="">did</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4724">as a precaution</st> so that <st data-num="3361" class="">no</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">one</st> should <st data-num="3469" class="">blame</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in regard to</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="100" class="">generous gift</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">we</st> are <st data-num="1247" class="">administering</st>.
For we are concerned about what is right not only before the Lord but also before men.

<st data-num="1161" class="">And</st> we are <st data-num="4842" class="">sending</st><n id="1" /> with <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="80" class="">brother</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">whom</st> we have <st data-num="1381" class="">tested</st> <st data-num="4178" class="">many times</st> and <st data-num="1510">found</st> <st data-num="4705" class="">eager</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="4183" class="">many matters</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> who <st data-num="3570" class="">now</st> is <st data-num="4183" class="">much</st> <st data-num="4705" class="">more eager</st> than ever because of the <st data-num="4183" class="">great</st> <st data-num="4006" class="">confidence</st> he has <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>.

<st data-num="1535" class="">If</st> there is any question<n id="1" /> <st data-num="5228" class="">about</st> <st data-num="5103" class="">Titus</st>, he is <st data-num="1699" class="">my</st> <st data-num="2844" class="">partner</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4904">fellow worker</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">among</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you;</st> <st data-num="1535" class="">if</st> there is any question about <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="80" class="">brothers</st>, they are <st data-num="652" class="">messengers</st><n id="2" /> of the <st data-num="1577" class="">churches</st>, a <st data-num="1391" class="">glory</st> to <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>.
Therefore show them openly before the churches the proof of your love and of our pride in you.
